skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weatherology
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We take weather to another level. Our patent pending technology delivers real-time audio weather reports to your location.

It’s real-time: With up-to-the-minute weather updates including the latest watches, warnings, advisories, and bulletins.
It’s real people, not voice simulation: Our weather talent will provide real-time weather reports on demand. 
It’s accurate and local: Set your zip code with Alexa and Weatherology can provide you with detailed weather information for your location.

The technology is new, but the Weatherology team has been around for 32 years. We've contributed to more local storm coverage awards and accolades than our largest competitors.

Enable the Weatherology skill for the latest real-time audio weather updates.
